actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

official_title: To require the Secretary of Education to assess the impact of school start times on student health, well-being, and performance.
short_title: Assessing Appropriate School Start Times Act

summary.text:
Assessing Appropriate School Start Times Act

Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to direct the Secretary of Education to study the impact of school start times on student health, well-being, and performance.

titles.title: Assessing Appropriate School Start Times Act
To require the Secretary of Education to assess the impact of school start times on student health, well-being, and performance.
